items.title: Basic usage ​- Block & Inline
items.description: inline, inline-block 및 block 유틸리티를 사용하여 텍스트와 요소의 흐름을 제어합니다.
items.code: When controlling the flow of text, using the CSS property display: inline will cause the text inside the element to wrap normally. While using the property display: inline-block will wrap the element to prevent the text inside from extending beyond its parent. Lastly, using the property display: block will put the element on its own line and fill its parent.
